attributes.action: Government ‘MUST’ give the Police More Funds as Crime is Getting out of Hand.
attributes.additional_details:
Every day now their are Youngsters Killed, this is sending Bad News to Tourists as well as Locals, the Main Issue is Fundings which would see more Foot Patrols and make the Public feel Safer.

Let’s get them their funds and Stop the Waste in Killings.
attributes.background: Stabbings and Murder Plus Youths on Mopeds Robbing people have got out of Hand, each day their are some issues mainly Teens, Police Patrols must get to know the ones who are on their Radar and so Must stop and search for Weapons, the Police need of Road Motorbikes to be able to follow them of Road
